channel.title: Friends Nerd Blood on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Friends Nerd Blood on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Anime
item.description: i really don’t know if i like anime or not. At first the fascination was based on experiencing something i had never experienced before. Then it got wierd. I kinda liked it because i was supposed to like it - according to the code of computer nerd. But now i am starting to get more into it. I just saw blood and it was really good. It was by the guys who did ghost in the shell, which i really enjoy.
